name: in1.com
tag_list: social-media, content-curation, startups, storytelling, social, facebook, twitter, linkedin, mobile-apps, mobile
overview:
in1.com is a Web/mobile platform that brings social content aggregation, sharing and curation together in one platform.

in1 provides an easy-to-use social sharing and marketing tool that disseminates content to Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn and Tumblr. In1 also provides a visual-centric search of popular resources (Etsy, Flickr, Craigslist, Wikipedia, Quora, Google, Bing, Blogs, RSS Feeds, TechCrunch, Business Insider, etc..) and standardizes (RDF, OpenGraph) the resource formats using metadata. in1 enables social sign-on via Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn or user can create their own In1 account. Users can browse/search curated resources and friend/follower status updates. In1 users can also “like”, save, comment and re-share any of the resources which include images, web sites, text snippets, blog posts, feeds and videos.

in1 is part social media marketing, catalog and curation tool where users can create collages of their favorite items, post their own content, and then re-syndicate their “story” boards from in1. In1 also provides broad engagement on thousands of topics.
